name: Premium Cotton Kurta – Traditional & Comfortable
description:
This premium kurta is designed for comfort, tradition, and devotional wear. Made from soft and breathable cotton, it provides ease of movement during bhajans, kirtans, and temple visits. The minimalistic design reflects spiritual simplicity while maintaining elegance. Fine stitching and lightweight fabric ensure long-lasting comfort.

Highlights:
100% breathable cotton
Traditional devotional design
Lightweight and skin-friendly
Ideal for temple service and festivals
Durable and easy to maintain
